name: General Culinary 7 Quiz | Food & Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which food item comes from the etymological roots 'Spear leek'?
What is the largest burrowing clam in the world?
What type of nuts are the dishes Chawan-mushi and Sazae-no-tsuboyaki made from?
What is the substance composed from glutenin and gliadin, which gives bread its nice texture?
What type of cheeses are: caprino, Ziegenkase, and Gaiskasli?
Where is the gelatin, Isinglass, obtained?
Jicama is a delicious tuber which is common in the Phillipines, yet it is almost extinct from where is originated. Where did Jicama come from?
Kermes is a purple-red dye used during the Middle Ages to hide the gross-appearance of food. What source does it come from?
What is the Indian name for the sweet-milk used to make my favorite puddings?
